parameters.name: AllowShutDown
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable No-activity Suspension. Default value: false. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: DBClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the serverless cluster.

parameters.name: ScaleMax
parameters.description: The maximum number of PCUs per node for scaling. Valid values: 1 PCU to 32 PCUs.

parameters.name: ScaleMin
parameters.description: The minimum number of PCUs per node for scaling. Valid values: 1 PCU to 31 PCUs.

parameters.name: ScaleRoNumMax
parameters.description: The maximum number of read-only nodes for scaling. Valid values: 0 to 15.

parameters.name: ScaleRoNumMin
parameters.description: The minimum number of read-only nodes for scaling. Valid values: 0 to 15.

parameters.name: SecondsUntilAutoPause
parameters.description: The detection period for No-activity Suspension. Valid values: 5 to 1440. Unit: minutes. The detection duration must be a multiple of 5 minutes.
